title.rendered: The best Xiaomi Smart TV is now at its minimum price

content.rendered:
Xiaomi has on the market since 2021 the P1 series of your smart TVs. Despite their tight price, they have quite interesting specifications for their PVP. However, when there is an offer that reduces its price even more, they become a bargain that you should not miss.

Let’s share the highlights of the 50-inch Mi TV P1 Smart TVwhich today is practically half price.

The best of Xiaomi P1 Series

The 50-inch Mi TV P1 is from 4K resolution (3,840 × 2,160 pixels) and stands out for its innovative design without frames on three sides (only on the bottom) that offers a superior screen-to-body ratio and 178 ° viewing angles.

Xiaomi MiTV P1

In this Mi TV P1 we are going to experience a higher dynamic range that provides brighter lights and darker shadows, which improves the contrast, sharpness and color of images while giving very realistic levels of detail due to its compatibility with HDR 10 +.

Incorporates the MEMC technology which can automatically interleave compensation frames in low frame rate content to eliminate image tearing and judder, providing greater fluidity for fast motion during sports broadcasts, motor racing and more.

In the sound section, it has two 10 W stereo speakers and decoding Dolby Audio and DTS-HD for powerful 3D surround sound.

Android TV, endless possibilities

The Mi TV P1 arrives with version 9 of Android TV installed as standard, which will ensure that we have a large space at our disposal to be able to install thousands of applications and also to access movies and programs of all kinds. In addition, it also counts integrated as standard Chromecast and Miracastso we can easily transmit content from our mobile devices or tablets without the need for third-party devices.

Android TV on the Mi TV P1

Through the android tv operating system You’ll have all the great apps on the market, with Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and YouTube pre-installed and a library of over 7,000 apps at your disposal. Also, it has MX Player, which is one of the best video players on the market.

Inside these televisions we find a MediaTek MT9611 processor, with four ARM Cortex A55 cores at 1.5 GHz, and an ARM Mali G52 MP2 GPU. It is accompanied by 2 GB of RAM and 16 GB of internal memory.

Currently, its price is reduced from 599 euros to only 349 euros. Even better, FNAC currently has a cashback program in place whereby you get 15 euros back for every 100 euros you spend, leaving the final price at 304 euros after the 45 cashback you will receive for a purchase over 300.

The articles listed contain an affiliate link that reports to ADSLZone a small commission for each purchase. The products that appear here have been chosen by the editors for being discounted, and their appearance here has nothing to do with any agreement with the brands.
